subject: Playoff Games
Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Ryan Vogelsong spent years in the minors after starting his major league career with San Francisco. Now back with the Giants, he has been their pitching star of the postseason.
snippet: Ryan Vogelsong spent years in the minors after starting his major league career with San Francisco. Now back with the Giants, he has been their pitching star of the postseason.
